  • java.lang.Object

    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResultListener, Visualization, EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class AbstractParallelVisualization<NV extends NumberVector<?>>
extends AbstractVisualization
    Abstract base class for parallel visualizations.
